item.title: LB3 Smart Lamp, LED Bedside Touch Lamps Compatible with Alexa and Google Home, App Go_sund Control, RGB Color Changing Dimmable & Warm White Night Light for Bedroom, USB Powered

Feel free to power on/off, dim brightness, change colors or scenes of the table lamp with easy control via App. Only support 2.4GHz WiFi, no hub requiredHands-Free Voice Control: The bedside lamp works with Alexa and Google Home ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:25:25 UTC – Details)



Smartphone Control: Connect smart lamp with Go_sund_App to manage smart home conveniently. Feel free to power on/off, dim brightness, change colors or scenes of the table lamp with easy control via App. Only support 2.4GHz WiFi, no hub required
Hands-Free Voice Control: The bedside lamp works with Alexa and Google Home to free up your hands; You can switch on/off and even change the colors of your lamp by simple voice command. No worries about can’t find the light switch when you walk into a dark room.
Tap Top to Power on/off: The creative built-in touch sensor allows you to tap twice on the top of the lamp to turn it on or off. Manually work with the slide area to change brightness and colors. It is convenient to switch white and color modes with the front button directly
16 Million Colors and 8 Scenes: With 16 million colors, you can select any color in the spectrum via your phone App to create an atmosphere such as a romantic dinner or warm sleep. Scenes are able to be created for your desired ambiance, like multiple colors, 1% – 100% brightness, and color-changing speed.
Timer & Schedule: The smart lamp can be turned on or off automatically according to the time you set. Or set a schedule to turn off the lamp based on your family’s sleep schedule.

4
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:25:25 UTC – Details)

Cool white lighting great suit for working, studying, reading.FOLDABLE AND PORTABLE DESIGN — This foldable LED desk lamp with 230° flexible arm and 90° base axis, good help to ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.99 - $21.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:21:23 UTC – Details)



TOUCH CONTROL DIMMABLE DESK LAMP — 5000K cool white desk lamp with 3 Brightness Levels, easily adjust the brightness by touch. Cool white lighting great suit for working, studying, reading.
FOLDABLE AND PORTABLE DESIGN — This foldable LED desk lamp with 230° flexible arm and 90° base axis, good help to save desk space. Easy to place in shelves, bags, suitcases, and box.
USB POWER (AC ADAPTER INCLUDED) — You can power the desk lamp by USB Port, easy to plug into any available USB port to power the lamp, such laptop, computer, power bank. Also, you can power by the AC Adapter which includes the package.
EYE CARING TABLE LAMP — This touch table lamps are designed to be soft, stable, and non-flickering light. The office desk lamp adopts surface led light source design which could perfectly eliminate glare, visual fatigue, and improve visual effects.
PREMIUM SERVICE&LONG LIFESPAN–Our led light designed to last for more than 50000 hours, you won’t replace the LED in the next 25 years,The desk lamp led comes with 365 days worry-free service and lifetime nice customer service.Just order this touch lamp without any risk.

4.5
Price: $29.99 - $21.99
